variant.question:
Calculate the lift coefficient from an aircraft near the stall in straight and level flight in clean configuration, given:


- Density: 1.225 kg/m³
- TAS: 73 kt
- Mass: 7 300 kg
- Wing area: 49 m^2^
- G: 9.81 m/s^2^
If you decelerate from 1.4 V~S~ to 1.05 V~S~, the percentage increase in the lift coefficient (expressed as a percentage of CL~MAX~), would be:

  Density: 1.225 kg/m^3^  
  Speed: 70 kts  
  Weight 1300 kg  
  Assume g = 9.81

options.text: There is not enough information to calculate the coefficient of lift
